title: Define lowering/ABI contract slice (Contract Definition) (issue #2353 / task M19-C001)
feature: M19 Lane C lowering scope-freeze deterministic evidence mapping; issue #2353; task M19-C001; sequence 1; dispatch title: [Compiler][M19][Lane C][M19-C001] Define lowering/ABI contract slice (Contract Definition)

mode_matrix.name: debug-o0
abi_requirements: async C thunk completion uses canonical call-shape order: context, status, result, error
status/result/error correlation is deterministic for success, error, and cancellation outcomes
callback invocation count remains exactly once per lowering dispatch
runtime_assertions: M19c001_validate_contract returns 1 for contract-compliant callback ordering and payload mapping
M19c001_validate_contract returns -1 for duplicate callback or status/payload ownership drift

mode_matrix.name: optimized-o2
abi_requirements: optimized lowering preserves canonical completion call-shape order from -O0
optimization does not reorder or fold status/result/error transport fields
exactly-once callback contract remains stable under optimization
runtime_assertions: negative-path sentinel return (-1) remains reachable for contract drift

abi_field_stability.required_shape: completion callback order is context -> status -> result -> error
success status carries result without error and non-success status does not carry success payload
